TopicTitle: Kerbal Industrial League - Starships and Vehicles - NEW VEHICLE

Articles.Content:
INTERESTING DESCRIPTION THAT ACCURATELY DESCRIBES THE COMPANY AND OUR GOALS

--------

Boar Class - Armored Transport

The Boar is a light armored transport and rover, for both military and civilian use. It has room for four Kerbals and a driver, in a sheltered inner section. The rear of the Boar has two ion drives for swift movement. There is also a ladder mounted on the top, allowing Kerbals to get a vantage point or climb a ledge.

The front of the Boar features two extendible "tusks", inspiring the Boar's name. They are not very useful for flipping craft, but are designed to push through debris without it smashing into the body of the transport.

The wheels of the Boar are supplied with power from two light power generators, and a small solar array.

Craft file coming soon!

--------

My favorite (and the only completed) variant of the Boar, the Kerbtyusha class Rocket Artillery Platform!

For the motherland, kermrades! The Kerbtyusha is named after an ancient artillery weapon from a planet beyond the Kerbol system. It dispenses glorious communism from four different ports, and can be reloaded through a long and annoying process that I really should fix. For power, the Kerbtyusha has batteries below the armor plating, and solar panels for recharging. The landing legs seen here are used to stabilize the craft for firing.

As you can see, Kermrade Jebed-ivan loves the Kerbtyusha and rocket propelled communism!

--------

More coming soon! I have to take some screenshots of proper ships.
